name: Federation of Veterinarians of Europe
membership: Member of The World Veterinary Association
goal:
The European veterinary profession, embodied by FVE, unites the veterinary profession to promote animal health, animal welfare and public health across Europe.
Â 
Together with its members, FVE aims to support veterinarians in delivering their professional responsibilities at the best possible level, recognised and valued by society
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Proposal for an Animal Health Law
Proposal for Veterinary Medicines regulation
Proposal for a Regulation on Medicated Feed
Modernisation of Meat Inspection
Directive on the Recognition of Professional Qualifications
Animal Welfare Topics
